metadata.title: CVE-2015-5697 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The get_bitmap_file function in drivers/md/md.c in the Linux kernel before4.1.6 does not initialize a certain bitmap data structure, which allowslocal users to obtain sensitive information from kernel memory via aGET_BITMAP_FILE ioctl call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
